G

gameoflife.core - module gameoflife.core
module-info ch.zhaw.gameconsoleapp
gamePanel - Variable in class ch.zhaw.gameconsoleapp.gameoflife.core.components.GamePanelImpl
2D-Array of the game panel
GamePanel - Interface in ch.zhaw.gameconsoleapp.gameoflife.core.components
this interface belongs to the class "GamePanelImpl" the methods are described in the class "GamePanelImpl"
GamePanelImpl - Class in ch.zhaw.gameconsoleapp.gameoflife.core.components
this class contains methods which describe the stats visible on the game panel the methods "copyState", "getState" and "setState" have been successfully test with JUnit (see "GamePanelTest")
GamePanelImpl() - Constructor for class ch.zhaw.gameconsoleapp.gameoflife.core.components.GamePanelImpl
 
GameServiceAutoSimulationMode - Class in ch.zhaw.gameconsoleapp.gameoflife.core.service
this class contains methods necessary for proceeding automatically simulation
GameServiceAutoSimulationMode(GameServiceMainOperations, GameServiceStepwiseSimulationMode) - Constructor for class ch.zhaw.gameconsoleapp.gameoflife.core.service.GameServiceAutoSimulationMode
 
GameServiceButtons - Class in ch.zhaw.gameconsoleapp.gameoflife.core.service
this class introduces the buttons relevant for playing Conway's Game of Life
GameServiceButtons(GameServiceMainOperations) - Constructor for class ch.zhaw.gameconsoleapp.gameoflife.core.service.GameServiceButtons
 
GameServiceMainOperations - Class in ch.zhaw.gameconsoleapp.gameoflife.core.service
this class contains methods which describe the main activities
GameServiceMainOperations() - Constructor for class ch.zhaw.gameconsoleapp.gameoflife.core.service.GameServiceMainOperations
 
GameServiceStepwiseSimulationMode - Class in ch.zhaw.gameconsoleapp.gameoflife.core.service
this class contains methods necessary for proceeding manually simulation
GameServiceStepwiseSimulationMode(GamePanel, Rules) - Constructor for class ch.zhaw.gameconsoleapp.gameoflife.core.service.GameServiceStepwiseSimulationMode
 
getGamePanel() - Method in class ch.zhaw.gameconsoleapp.gameoflife.core.service.GameServiceStepwiseSimulationMode
getter returns updated game panel (this method is relevant for the class "MainActivities" --> method "drawing")
getState(int, int) - Method in interface ch.zhaw.gameconsoleapp.gameoflife.core.components.GamePanel
 
getState(int, int) - Method in class ch.zhaw.gameconsoleapp.gameoflife.core.components.GamePanelImpl
method "getState" pads pixels outside of the game panel with zeros padding (like in image processing) is necessary because once the corner pixel has to define its neighbours, it has to know if the pixel out out game panel is dead or alive (logically the pixels outside of the game panel have to be declared as dead) moreover, without padding the code is running to following error: ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException" finally, the method "getState" checks the position of the coordinates, makes sure they are not out of game panel and requests the coordinates back
getStepwiseSimulationMode() - Method in class ch.zhaw.gameconsoleapp.gameoflife.core.service.GameServiceMainOperations
getter method relevant for the class "GameServiceButton" returns the manual simulation mode (see also class "GameServiceButton" --> method "nextButton" and "switchingToSimulationMode")
